p: The volatile compounds, namely, citronellol, alpha-terpineol, o-cymene, d-limonene, eucalyptol, alpha-pinene, and 3-carene from E. globulus and C. citrodora were analysed for molecular properties. All the compounds had molecular weight below 500, hydrogen bond donor ≤5, hydrogen bond acceptor ≤10, and logP value ≤5. Hence, all compounds obey Lipinski’s rule of 5. The PubChem id, 2D, 3D structures, Lipinski’s rule are shown in Table 3 .
